subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Zack Wheeler and Matt Harvey will be the starting pitchers in Tuesday’s doubleheader, but it’s unlikely they’ll come close to the Mets’ greatest doubleheader pitching performance.
snippet: Zack Wheeler and Matt Harvey will be the starting pitchers in Tuesday’s doubleheader, but it’s unlikely they’ll come close to the Mets’ greatest doubleheader pitching performance.
